modules.description: Compares IP address values using a custom comparison function. Formats IPv4 and IPv6 addresses for human-readable output. Operates on a unified IP address type that encapsulates both IPv4 and IPv6 representations.

Provides identity and composition operations for wrapping and transforming values. Works with a single type constructor that aliases its argument. Enables sequential value manipulation and function application in a linear flow.

Handles request routing, response generation, and connection management for Gemini protocol servers. Processes structured data like routes, HTTP-like headers, and binary content. Used to create real-time text-based web services with custom middleware and secure socket handling.

Encapsulates IP address handling and value transformation logic, offering unified operations for comparing, formatting, and manipulating network addresses and arbitrary values. Supports a single type for IPv4 and IPv6 addresses, along with a wrapper type for linear value composition. Allows custom comparisons, human-readable formatting, and sequential function application. Enables tasks like IP validation, address string conversion, and chained value processing.
